alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 240 PM EDT/140 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Vernon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Ebro, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Seminole Hills, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Camp Flowers and Bahama Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
